abstracts.cdata!:
In the light of the prevailing country
            practices and conditions and with the objective of aligning
            better with the country systems, there will be an extension
            of the timeline of the submission of the audits in the India
            portfolio from six to nine months for all active projects,
            starting with audit report due for FY2015. All future
            projects will continue to use the flexibility provided by
            OP/BO 10.00 in terms of determining the timing of the audit.
            This proposal to extend the date of submission of annual
            audit reports to nine months across the active India
            portfolio is being processed in response to India’s request
            dated 21-January-2015.
